The video footage predates the outbreak: as older versions of the clip were found from 2016, 2017, and 2018.
A caption on one of the videos uploaded: a television channel, provided details of the event, stating that it was President Magafuli entertaining guests at the University of Dar es Salaam after laying the foundation stone for the construction of new hostels in October 2016.
The images featured in the misleading Fa: further confirming the authenticity of the video.
